Package boofcv.processing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Boof
    Main class for invoking processing functions.
    ConvertProcessing
    Functions for converting between BoofCV and Processing image data types
    FiducialFound
    Location of the found fiducial.
    ResultsBlob
    Storage for results from blob finding in a binary image
    SimpleAssociateDescription<Desc extends TupleDesc>
    Simplified point feature association
    SimpleBinary
    Simplified interface for handling binary images
    SimpleColor
    Simplified interface for handling color images
    SimpleContour
    Storage for a the contours from a binary image and the labeled blobs inside the image.
    SimpleContourList
    List of SimpleContour
    SimpleDenseOpticalFlow<T extends ImageBase>
    Simplified version of DenseOpticalFlow
    SimpleDetectDescribePoint<T extends ImageBase,Desc extends TupleDesc>
    Simplified version of DetectDescribePoint.
    SimpleFiducial
    Simplified interface for detecting fiducials
    SimpleFiducialSquareImage
    Wrapper around boofcv.abst.fiducial.SquareImage_to_FiducialDetector which provides ability to add targetes.
    SimpleGradient<T extends ImageBase>
    Storage for image gradients
    SimpleGray
    High level interface for handling gray scale images
    SimpleImage<T extends ImageBase>
    Base class for simplified images.
    SimpleImageSegmentation
    Simplified interface around ImageSuperpixels.
    SimpleLabeledImage
    Simplified interface for labeled images.
    SimpleTrackerObject
    Simplified interface for TrackerObjectQuad.
    SimpleTrackerPoints
    Wrapper around PointTracker with a simplified interface.
    VisualizeProcessing
    Functions for visualizing BoofCV data for Processing
